parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a CMF number (CMF 11240015). This suggests the post is related to official electoral campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and promotes Elena Lasconi, a candidate for the presidential elections in Romania.  The text "În turul 2 votăm Elena Lasconi!" directly advocates for her.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. It's not a private message; it's public and aims for broad dissemination.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to influence voters to choose Elena Lasconi in the second round of the presidential elections. The endorsement by Igor Grosu, President of the Parliament of Moldova, further strengthens this intent. The phrasing "În turul 2 votăm Elena Lasconi!" is a clear call to action.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it's a clear expression of support for a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the quote is attributed to Igor Grosu, the overall message transcends personal opinion and functions as overt electoral propaganda.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>8547083375402612</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Elena Lasconi), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact dates are not specified in the provided data, the context suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Lasconi), and goes beyond journalistic reporting by being a direct endorsement. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The fact that it's a paid advertisement on a public platform amplifies its reach and impact.  The counter-argument could be that the post discusses the Moldovan elections, but the clear call to action to vote for Lasconi in the Romanian presidential election overrides this.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Teodor Lazăr, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 8547083375402612) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o cheltuială de 300-399 RON și a atins 10.000-15.000 de impresii, promovează explicit candidata Elena Lasconi, folosind fraza "În turul 2 votăm Elena Lasconi!",  constituind un apel direct la vot.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 indică material electoral oficial.  Deși postarea menționează alegerile din Republica Moldova, mesajul principal este o îndemnare clară la vot pentru Elena Lasconi în alegerile prezidențiale românești, având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra acesteia.  Contactul advertiserului este teodor.lazar@gmail.com și +40740269432.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
